title: I have an error, it reads can't find a valid operating system the device will not start, then is tells me to visit this link on another device
content: my phone is lock out and it will not do anything about the only thing I can do is hold the hold the power and volume buttons down at the same time then I get some options (start,power off, barcode, recovery mode, restart bootloader) I tried selecting start and power off but did not want to select any of the others because I do not know what i'm doing
